accordion.title: Weekly Quizzes and Fun Exercises
accordion.content: Partake in regularly organized quizzes and fun exercises that enhance your learning.

accordion.title: Project-Based Learning
accordion.content: This course will let you work on several real-life AI projects that demand minimal coding expertise.

accordion.title: Industry Relevant Curriculum
accordion.content: The curriculum is designed by highly experienced professionals of AI. It is simple yet comprehensive, and perfect to teach AI for high school students.

accordion.title: Curated AI Demonstrations
accordion.content: Understand various applications of AI from mentors in simplified formats.

accordion.title: Virtual Mentor Pods
accordion.content: Learn and clarify doubts from mentors in small groups.

accordion.title: Top Class Faculty and Mentors
accordion.content: Enable your children with practical insights from several experienced industry practitioners from top organizations.
